customer_messages.message:
Dear Moza Al-Thani,

We sincerely apologize for the delay in your delivery. Due to unexpected traffic conditions in Deira, your new estimated delivery time is 18:29.

We appreciate your patience and will ensure your order arrives as soon as possible. If you have any concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us.

Thank you for your understanding.

Best regards,
Smart Delivery Team

dispatcher_alerts.message:
**DISPATCH ALERT: Driver DRV001**

• 1 HIGH priority delays
• 1 MEDIUM priority delays

Recommended Actions:
1. Contact affected customers immediately
2. Review route optimization options
3. Consider backup driver assignment for critical orders
4. Monitor traffic conditions for remaining stops

recommendations: Implement dynamic route optimization for high-traffic areas
Increase buffer time for deliveries in Dubai Marina and Downtown
Consider additional drivers during peak hours (5-7 PM)
